page.title: 07John Wilkinson School
page.content: The John Wilkinson School is on the outskirts of Broseley opposite a new housing estate called the Tileries.It opened in 1976. There are 159 children aged 5 to 11.There are 6 classes. We don't have a teacher for each subject but we change teachers every year.As well as lessons we have lots of clubs after school which are free. At the clubs we can do different sports, handicrafts,science,music, drama,gym or cooking. At the end of the year the children who are leaving have a party. Every year there is a school trip, some of the places the school has been are Switzerland,Belguim,The Shetlands,on the canal,Ludlow,London and this Summer a week camping in Wales. We also have day visits.
